content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper plate factory at position(x=-52.0)
Consists of following entities
- Furnace at position (x=61.0, y=-52.0) and another furnace at position (x=63.0, y=-52.0)
- The first furnace is currently working with fuel and has a warning indicating that its result is full.
- The second furnace has no fuel and is also full of copper plates.
- A third furnace at position (x=65.0, y=-52.0) is present but has no ingredients to smelt.

### Copper ore mine at position(x=-28.5, y=-61.5)
Consists of multiple instances of harvesting copper ore from the same location.

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into furnaces
- Ensure that the furnace is not full before attempting to insert items. The current furnaces at positions (61.0, -52.0) and (63.0, -52.0) have warnings indicating they are full.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
